name: Freaky Stan
description:
Freaky Stan is a new relaxing comics puzzle game. You won’t get bored by the multiple levels full of bright colors and an authentic thrilling story to follow. It’s always up to you how to end each storyline - be your own game creator!

Meet Stan, a goofy guy who is desperately in love with the beautiful Star. Will he be able to impress her? Will she answer his feelings? Will we see the love story unfolding before our eyes? Play now and find it out, as this tricky, yet challenging and cute puzzle game develops level by level! Boost your logic skills and your IQ level!

The game begins with quite simple puzzle levels to teach you how to play, but every level gets tougher while the story is developing. Make your choice as you go and you’ll help the poor guy reach his dreams. Lots of fun are on the way!
